definitions.text: a fact about some part (as opposed to general)
examples: he always reasons from the particular to the general

definitions.text: a medicine that has a mitigating effect on a specific disease
examples: quinine is a specific for malaria

definitions.text: (sometimes followed by `to') applying to or characterized by or distinguishing something particular or special or unique
examples: a specific and detailed account of the accident

definitions.text: relating to or distinguishing or constituting a taxonomic species
being or affecting a disease produced by a particular microorganism or condition; used also of stains or dyes used in making microscope slides
examples: quinine is highly specific for malaria
a specific stain is one having a specific affinity for particular structural elements
